Today we inaugurate the expansion of Emilio Arenales Catalán Mixed Urban Official Primary School, in the municipality of Nentón, Huehuetenango.
With the expansion we will provide education to 800 students, increasing the education capacity of Nentón and its surrounding communities.
Children should not be in the streets or working, they should study because it is the best legacy we will leave them.
We also delivered the new road section from Chiantla to Huehuetenango. These works will bring development to the department and its municipalities.
